pr_title: GEODE-7711: remove unnecessary decoding step after server receives th…

timeline.message:
GEODE-7711: remove unnecessary decoding step after server receives the command

* url encoding/decoming should have been done by spring framework

GEODE-7711: remove unnecessary decoding step after server receives the command

* url encoding/decoming should have been done by spring framework

timeline.bodyText: Don't really need the comment here. Name of test should describe what the test is doing. Consider making test method name more descriptive ie. command_encodes_and_decodes_special_characters_properly
timeline.author: jmelchio

replies.bodyText: good suggestion. Will keep that in mind when writing future tests.
replies.author: jinmeiliao
